blueprint.description: Installs Teleport (a security tool) on nearly any platform
blueprint.overview: [Teleport](https://goteleport.com/) is a free and open-source tool that allows engineers and security professionals to unify access for SSH servers, Kubernetes clusters, web applications, and databases across all environments. It is an identity-aware, multi-protocol access proxy which understands SSH, HTTPS, Kubernetes API, MySQL and PostgreSQL wire protocols.
blueprint.name: Teleport
blueprint.title: Teleport
